about.title: About Lion Personal Realty Services
about.slogan: Leading the talent that moves the industry.
about.description: Lion Personal Realty Services is the strategic ally that connects specialized talent with the critical demands of the Venezuelan energy industry. From our operational base in Maracaibo, Zulia State, we provide comprehensive human capital solutions designed to ensure continuity, safety and efficiency of high-demand projects.

whatWeDo.title: What we do?
whatWeDo.description: We specialize in providing technical and professional outsourcing services for the oil, gas and energy sectors. We comprehensively manage human resources, covering selection, hiring, payroll administration, social benefits and labor relations, allowing our clients to eliminate administrative and legal liabilities and focus on their business operations.
